entry.title: Introducing Hourglass
entry.summary: This proposal presents a straightforward solution aimed at preventing the mass liquidation of Pay to Public Key (P2PK) funds. The detailed documentation and rationale behind this proposed solution can be found extensively outlined in the provided specification. For those interested in exploring the specifics or providing feedback on this approach, the complete information is accessible through the project's GitHub repository, available at [this link](https://github.com/cryptoquick/bips/blob/hourglass/bip-hourglass.mediawiki). This initiative is brought to attention within the Bitcoin Development Mailing List due to its relevance and potential impact on the community, highlighting its importance for subscribers who are engaged in the technical evolution and security aspects of Bitcoin.
